thread.title: TCL drops video teaser of upcoming BlackBerry 'Mercury' ahead of CES 2017!
thread.title_full: TCL drops video teaser of upcoming BlackBerry 'Mercury' ahead of CES 2017!

author: Bla1ze
title: TCL drops video teaser of upcoming BlackBerry 'Mercury' ahead of CES 2017!
text:
Steve Cistulli, President and General Manager for TCL Communication (TCT), North America just dropped a nice teaser for the BlackBerry device they plan to unveil at CES 2017.

*/ /*-->*/ 
With TCL already letting it be known they will 'unveil an evolutionary first in the mobile industry' and include a first look at how the BlackBerry brand will live on at CES, perhaps getting a tease ahead of CES 2017 is no surprise, but that's exactly what Steve Cistulli, President and General Manager for TCL Communication (TCT), North America dropped on Twitter.
Read More Â»
